name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, and pancetta
cooking_instructions:
1. Cook pasta according to package directions
2. Cook pancetta until crispy
3. Beat eggs with cheese
4. Combine hot pasta with egg mixture
5. Add pancetta and black pepper

name: Chicken Stir Fry
description: Quick and healthy stir fry with vegetables
cooking_instructions:
1. Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces
2. Stir fry chicken until cooked
3. Add vegetables and stir fry
4. Add sauce and serve over rice

name: Beef Tacos
description: Mexican-style beef tacos with fresh toppings
cooking_instructions:
1. Brown ground beef with spices
2. Warm tortillas
3. Assemble tacos with meat and toppings
4. Serve with salsa and guacamole

name: Vegetarian Chili
description: Hearty vegetarian chili with beans and vegetables
cooking_instructions:
1. Saut√© onions and garlic
2. Add vegetables and cook
3. Add beans and tomatoes
4. Simmer for 30 minutes
5. Season to taste

name: Grilled Salmon
cooking_instructions: 1. Season salmon with herbs and lemon\n2. Grill for 6-8 minutes per side\n3. Serve with vegetables
